doc.title: Junipero
doc.plot: Far beyond our own time exists the remains of an Earth long since re-conquered by the natural world, an Earth devoid of human civilization. Some miles off a long forgotten coastline, two weary companions wander the forests in search of a legendary place, a tiny beach marked by red sand and old tattered flags. Though an unlikely pair, their journey represents the end of strong friendship, their dreams of hope holding them together through even the worst of ages.
